blood_bonus.description: Enable blood bonus for this challenge
blood_bonus.label: Blood Bonus

bonus.description: The Triple Blood Bonus refers to the additional points awarded when a challenge is solved by the first three teams. Each team can receive a scoring bonus based on the current points of the challenge. The bonus will be added to the team's score in the form of a fixed percentage.

challenges.delete: Are you sure you want to delete challenge {{name}}?
challenges.disable: Are you sure you want to disable challenge {{name}}?

empty.description: Click the top right to create the first challenge
empty.title: Ouch! This game has no challenge yet.

challenges.enable: Are you sure you want to enable challenge {{name}}?

flag.create:
Create flags. Multiple flags should be separated by lines, one flag per line.
Each challenge can have multiple flags. Any configured flags can be accepted.
flag.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this flag?

empty.description: Please add flag via top right corner
empty.title: The flag list is empty

instructions.both: If you need to enable leet flag with <1>[TEAM_HASH], add the <2>[LEET] tag before the flag template string. The entropy of the flag template string will not be checked.
instructions.complex: If you need to enable special characters in flag generation, use <1>[CLEET]</1> instead of <2>[LEET]</2> at the beginning of the string. This may cause injection issues.
instructions.description: Please enter flag template string, leave it blank to generate random GUID as flag
instructions.guid: Specify <1>[GUID]</1> to replace only placeholder here with random GUID
instructions.leet: Leet will be enabled if <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> is not specified and will change strings in braces based on the template. Please make sure the entropy of flag template is high enough.
instructions.team_hash: If <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> is specified, it will be automatically replaced with the hash generated by team token and contest's information

deadline.expired: Deadline passed at {{deadline}}, submissions are disabled
deadline.label: Deadline

flag_placeholders: To be, or not to be, flag is the question
All that glisters is not flag
The flag, dear Brutus, is not in our stars
Better three hours too soon than a flag too late
My kingdom for a flag
Shall I compare thee to a flag?
Put flag in thy pocket, and be gone
Here's flag: I drink to thee
For never was a flag of more woe
For where thou art, there is the flag
My flag is in my heart, not in my head
Fearless minds climb soonest unto flag
But, for my own part, it was flag to me
What's mine is flag and what's yours is mine
This blessed plot, this earth, this realm, this flag
The ripest flag first falls
One touch of flag makes the whole world kin
Better a witty flag than a foolish wit
Even if there are a thousand kinds of flags, who else can I talk to?
The flag is still shining in an unknown area.
May I ask where the flag is?

actions.note: You can extend it {{min}} mins before expires.

description.proxy: WebSocket proxy mode has been enabled.

no_container.message: This challenge requires creating an instance

wrong_flag_hints: Where there's a will, there's a flag.
To be, or not to be, that is not the flag.
Pride hurts, flag benefits.
Failure teaches flags.
No, no, it's not this flag.
Eyes wide open, but the flag is not here.
Don't be impetuous, think carefully.
Searching everywhere, this is not the answer.
Superficially looking, you haven't found the flag.
The answer should be right at your fingertips.
Careful planning and consideration, flag is not that simple.
The flag is really well hidden!
Is it loneliness that crushes you when your luck is bad?
Too excited! You still need to learn to think more calmly.
Hit a wall, could it be that you have reached the peak?
The years are peaceful, but the flag has gone far away.
The shallow water has dried up, the flag is still not found.
Where this flag can be found?
Beautiful thumbnails like smoke. Where did the flag go?
The quagmire is deep in depth, and the flag is still not found.
All is quiet, only the error prompt of the flag is here.
The correct flag is still not obtained.
The winds are bitter and cold, and the flag is still not on your hand.

content.game_lasts_long: The game will last for a long time

content: Are you sure you want to register for this game?

After successfully registering for the game and passing the review, the team will be locked and you will no longer be able to remove any member from the team. The team will be unlocked after the game ends or when the participation request is rejected.
The limit on the number of players refers to the number of members that have decided to participate as part of the specific team, regardless of which team you choose to play with.

division.description: This game has multiple division available. Please select your division.
division.label: Select Division

invite_code.description: This game is invitation-only. To participate in, please enter an invitation code.

team.description: Please select a team you want to participate with in this game. This cannot be changed after participation request approval.
team.label: Select your team

join.title: Registration Information

content: Are you sure you want to quit this game?
If the number of team members is zero after you quit, the team's participation data will be deleted.
